author: EstherFrances
content:
Fantastic bit of history and a glimpse into the life of a surely indomitable and willful woman , old “Scottie” would have something to add I am sure.
Heartfelt Thanks!

author: Willy
content: I gather she wore gloves and was why she didnt go crazy from the mercury

author: Bob Wright
content:
Rick: Thank you so much for including my song here. I am very proud of it and have played it lots of places; it is a particular favorite in the UK and Ireland. I am most proud of teaching it to lots of local school kids on Staten Island.
Hope to see you again at one of the shanty sessions at the Noble; the proud owners of Robbins Reef Lighthouse.

author: Jan Christensen
content: Long past time — still, happy it’s happening.
